text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ

translation.en.sahih: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun manusia apabila Tuhannya mengujinya lalu dia dimuliakan-Nya dan diberi-Nya kesenangan, maka dia akan berkata: "Tuhanku telah memuliakanku".
